fields.description:
Outdated topics need to match wireframe:
https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/wiki/display/3UD/Create+Load+Balancer
https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/wiki/display/3UD/Load+balancer+details

comments.body: comments sent to [~tvo] as email attachment. Reassigning to [~kgill] to review content.
[~tvo]: The help content for the Create ELB wizard looks great so far!  Should I punt this back to you to document the remaining tabs?

[~kgill]: [~jloza] had a comment on my create LB help topic and asked for your input as to why someone would add a certificate to the backend. Can you provide me with more info please?
Thanks!
Reviewed three new docs via email. Reassigned to Kamal for his review.
[~tvo]: I only see the doc for the ELB General tab attached in this ticket.  Are the docs for the remaining tabs available for review?
Correct-please see email from me for the attachments.
[~tvo]: I don't see the email.  Could you resend or upload the docs to the ticket?

[~tvo]: The docs for the ELB General, Instances, and Health Checks tab for the Create ELB wizard look good (after reviewing the attached docs via email).  I'm punting this ticket back to you to implement the ELB Detail Page help topics.

[~dkavanagh] Please add new hooks for these topics that didn't exist before for Create LB pages:
	eucaconsole/static/html/help/console_create_load_balancer_general.html
	eucaconsole/static/html/help/console_create_load_balancer_health.html
	eucaconsole/static/html/help/console_create_load_balancer_instances.html
	eucaconsole/static/html/help/console_create_load_balancer_network.html

Hi [~tvo] can you open a ticket against the GUI project for implementation needs, please? I'd hate to see this forgotten by accident. 

Thanks!

[~tvo], Great job!

For the instances doc, it's super important to note here that you can add instances to a load balancer without enabling the zone, but they will not receive traffic until the zone is enabled. Couldn't comment on that document directly because it was html instead of PDF, sorry!

I had no comments on health check and monitoring docs. 

General doc with comments attached.
An approved copy of the latest console_load_balancer_detail_general attached for reference.
